hero.description: Hypertrade is a leading DEX aggregator for the Hyperliquid blockchain, helping traders find the best cryptocurrency exchange rates. The Hypertrade platform unifies HyperEVM and HyperCore liquidity by automatically scanning all available decentralized exchanges for optimal swap conditions.
features: Execution of complex routes in a single transaction
Support for over XXX tokens on Hyperliquid

whatIs.title: What is Hypertrade and How the DEX Aggregator Works
whatIs.description: Hypertrade is a specialized decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator designed specifically for the Hyperliquid ecosystem. Unlike regular DEXs where you are limited to one platform's liquidity, Hypertrade scans all available liquidity sources on Hyperliquid and finds the optimal route for your swap.

steps.title: 1. Global Liquidity Scanning
steps.desc: The Hypertrade router analyzes all DEXs on Hyperliquid, including HyperCore Spot with its on-chain order books, Hyperswap and Kittenswap AMM protocols, as well as other integrated platforms.

steps.title: 2. Smart Order Splitting
steps.desc: When Hypertrade detects that splitting your order across multiple DEXs will result in a better outcome, it automatically executes split-routing, minimizing price impact.

steps.title: 3. Using Intermediate Tokens
steps.desc: Hypertrade can use intermediate tokens in the route (e.g., Token A â†’ USDC â†’ Token B) if this reduces slippage or fees compared to a direct swap.

steps.title: 4. Pre-execution Simulation
steps.desc: Hypertrade's Invisium Swap Simulations technology pre-calculates the result of complex routes, showing the exact expected output before the transaction is confirmed.

advantages.title: Why Traders Choose Hypertrade
advantages.subtitle: Maximum benefit from every swap and advanced technology.

items.title: Max Value
items.desc: Using Hypertrade, you automatically access the entire Hyperliquid ecosystem liquidity (HyperCore Spot, Hyperswap, Kittenswap, Prjx). The router finds the best price even if it needs to split the order across 3-4 venues.

items.title: Invisium Simulation
items.desc: You see the result before confirmation. Invisium calculates exact output, price impact, and slippage. Simulation accuracy is 99.5â€“99.9%.

items.title: Single Transaction
items.desc: Even if the optimal route involves 3-4 hops, everything is executed in a single transaction. Fewer points of failure, gas savings, higher speed.

items.title: Zero Platform Fees
items.desc: Hypertrade does not charge an aggregation fee. You pay only standard HYPE gas and the underlying DEX fees.

comparison.title: Hypertrade vs Other DEX Aggregators
comparison.subtitle: The only aggregator with full HyperCore Spot support.
comparison.conclusion: Conclusion: Hypertrade is the only aggregator on Hyperliquid with HyperCore Spot support and simulations, ensuring the best liquidity and quote accuracy.

howTo.title: How to Start Trading via Hypertrade
howTo.subtitle: Step-by-step guide to using the platform.

steps.title: Step 1. Prepare Wallet
steps.desc: Use an EVM-compatible wallet (MetaMask, WalletConnect). Ensure Hyperliquid network is selected and you have HYPE tokens (5-10) for gas.

steps.title: Step 2. Select Tokens
steps.desc: Go to the official site ht.xyz and connect your wallet. Select the token to swap and the token you want to receive.

steps.title: Step 3. Check Route
steps.desc: Hypertrade will show the proposed route, expected result, and price impact. Adjust slippage if necessary.

steps.title: Step 4. Execute Swap
steps.desc: Click 'Swap' and confirm the transaction in your wallet. Tokens will automatically appear in seconds.

integrations.title: Integration with Hyperliquid Ecosystem
integrations.subtitle: We unite the best protocols to create the deepest liquidity.

items.title: HyperCore Spot
items.desc: High-performance on-chain order book system (up to 200,000 TPS). The foundation of liquidity for large trades.

items.title: Hyperswap & Kittenswap
items.desc: AMM protocols for a wide range of trading pairs and long-tail assets.

items.title: Expanding Network
items.desc: New DEXs (Prjx, etc.) and lending protocols are automatically added to the R1 router.

security.title: Security
security.nonCustodialDesc: Hypertrade never accesses your funds. All swaps are executed directly from your wallet.
security.consensusDesc: All transactions are protected by the Hyperliquid L1 consensus mechanism. Finality in seconds.
security.transparencyDesc: Before confirmation, you see full details: every DEX, intermediate tokens, and fees.
security.referralDesc: Get a unique link, share with friends, and accumulate points. Use Hypertrade for swaps and invite active traders.
security.tokenStatusDesc: The Hypertrade team has not announced a token launch or airdrop at this time. However, activity may be considered in the future.

items.question: What is Hypertrade?
items.answer: Hypertrade is a DEX aggregator for the Hyperliquid blockchain that automatically finds the best exchange rates by scanning all available liquidity sources on HyperEVM and HyperCore.

items.question: Does Hypertrade charge an exchange fee?
items.answer: No, Hypertrade does not charge a liquidity aggregation fee. You only pay standard Hyperliquid network gas (in HYPE tokens) and the DEX fees themselves.

items.question: Which tokens does Hypertrade support?
items.answer: Hypertrade supports all tokens available on integrated DEXs (HyperCore Spot, Hyperswap, Kittenswap), including major pairs and new listings.

items.question: Is Hypertrade safe to use?
items.answer: Yes. Hypertrade uses a non-custodial model (you keep control of keys), verified liquidity sources, and is protected by HyperBFT consensus.

items.question: How does Hypertrade differ from a regular DEX?
items.answer: A regular DEX is limited to its own liquidity. Hypertrade scans all DEXs simultaneously, finds the best price, splits orders, and executes complex swaps in a single transaction.

items.question: Do I need HYPE tokens?
items.answer: Yes, HYPE tokens are required to pay for gas on the Hyperliquid network.

items.question: What is Invisium simulation?
items.answer: It's a pre-swap calculation technology. It shows exact expected output and slippage before transaction confirmation with 99.5-99.9% accuracy.

items.question: Is there a Hypertrade token?
items.answer: No token launch has been announced yet. However, a referral program is active, and activity might be considered in the future.

items.question: How to start using Hypertrade?
items.answer: Prepare an EVM wallet, add the Hyperliquid network, top up HYPE balance, and go to ht.xyz.

articleDex.title: What is a DEX Aggregator and Why Traders Need It
articleDex.intro: Imagine you want to buy a new smartphone. You can go to one store and buy it for $1000, or spend an hour visiting ten different stores to find the same phone for $850. The $150 difference is the price of your time and effort. Now imagine an app that checks all stores in a second and automatically finds the best price. That's how DEX aggregators work.
articleDex.whatIsTitle: What is a DEX Aggregator: Simply Put
articleDex.whatIsDesc: A DEX aggregator is a service that automatically scans multiple decentralized exchanges (DEXs) simultaneously to find the most profitable exchange rate.
articleDex.analogyDesc: If a regular DEX is a single shop with fixed prices, a DEX aggregator is a smart assistant that checks prices in all shops in town instantly, finding the best deal for you.
articleDex.problemTitle: Problem: Why One DEX is Expensive

reasons.title: Reason 1: Cost Savings
reasons.content: Math is simple: average savings of 0.5â€“2% per transaction.

reasons.title: Reason 2: Access to All Liquidity
reasons.content: Instead of one pool, you get liquidity from all AMMs and order books.

reasons.title: Reason 3: Minimizing Slippage
reasons.content: Aggregators reduce slippage by splitting orders across pools.

reasons.title: Reason 4: Saving Time
reasons.content: With aggregator: 30 seconds. Enter tokens, amount, and confirm.

reasons.title: Reason 5: MEV Protection
reasons.content: Using private mempools so bots can't profit from your transaction.

reasons.title: Reason 6: Gas Optimization
reasons.content: Gas savings: 20â€“40% compared to manual swaps.

reasons.title: Reason 7: Intermediate Routes
reasons.content: Aggregator automatically finds complex paths (A â†’ B â†’ C) that are more profitable.

articleDex.mathTitle: How Much Can You Really Save?
articleDex.chooseTitle: How to Choose the Right Aggregator
articleDex.conclusionText: If you trade crypto in 2025â€“2026 and don't use a DEX aggregator, you are literally throwing money away.
